name: twitter-multi-user-monitor
description: Twitter多用户监控系统，支持多API凭证轮换、智能时间调度和钉钉通知

scripts.twitter:official:refresh-token:auth: node -e "import('./src/monitors/twitter/official/auth/TwitterAuthManager.js').then(m => { const auth = new m.TwitterAuthManager(); auth.initializeDatabase().then(() => auth.authenticateAllCredentials()); })"
scripts.twitter:official:refresh-token:check: node -e "import('./src/monitors/twitter/official/auth/TwitterAuthManager.js').then(m => { const auth = new m.TwitterAuthManager(); auth.initializeDatabase().then(() => auth.checkAuthenticationStatus()); })"
